targets.rawSql: select time, Miners [Active] from vwMinerCountByTime where  $__timeFilter(time)

select max(time) time, count(GPUIDX) Active from [dbo].[MinerGPUDetail] D inner join MinerSummary S on D.MinerSummaryID = S.ID 
where  
 $__timeFilter(time) 
 and isnull(D.Performance,0) > 20
group by D.RunID
select time, ActualHashRate [Actual h/r] from EtherMineSummary where  $__timeFilter(time)
select time, AverageHashRate/1000000 [Pool h/r] from EtherMineSummary where  $__timeFilter(time)
select time, CoinsPerMin * 60 * 24 as [Coins/day]  from EtherMineSummary where  $__timeFilter(time)
select time, USDPerMin * 60 * 24 as [USD/day]  from EtherMineSummary where  $__timeFilter(time)
select time, ValidShares as [Valid Shares]  from EtherMineSummary where  $__timeFilter(time)
select time, isnull(InvalidShares,0) + isnull(StaleShares,0) as [Invalid Shares]  from EtherMineSummary where  $__timeFilter(time)
select time, ETH from vwEthValue

select S.HashRate Miner1 from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner
where M.LastRunID = (select max(LastRunID) from Miners) and M.Miner = 'Miner1'

select S.HashRate Miner1 from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner
where M.LastRunID = (select max(LastRunID) from Miners) and M.Miner = 'Miner2'

select S.HashRate Miner1 from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner
where M.LastRunID = (select max(LastRunID) from Miners) and M.Miner = 'Miner3'

select S.HashRate Miner1 from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner

select S.HashRate Miner1 from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner

select S.HashRate Miner1 from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner
where M.LastRunID = (select max(LastRunID) from Miners) and M.Miner = 'Miner7'

select count(GPUIDX) GPUs from [dbo].[MinerGPUDetail] D
inner join MinerSummary S
on D.RunID = S.RunID
and D.MinerSummaryID = S.ID
where D.RunID in (select max(LastRunID) from Miners)
and Miner = 'Miner1'

select S.SwitchPower Outlet from Miners M inner join MinerSummary S on M.LastRunID = S.RunID and M.Miner = S.Miner
where M.LastRunID = (select max(LastRunID) from Miners) and M.Miner = 'Miner1'

where M.LastRunID = (select max(LastRunID) from Miners) and M.Miner = 'Miner3'

select   'GPU ' + cast(GPUIDX as varchar(2)) as GPU, Temp [ ] from vwMiningGPUs where  Miner = 'Miner1'
select   'GPU ' + cast(GPUIDX as varchar(2)) as GPU, Performance as [ ] from vwMiningGPUs where   Miner = 'Miner1'

select time, USD from vwEthValue
select time, [x Rate] from vwEthValue

SELECT 
   time, 
   Miner , 
   HashRate as [Real], 
   ReportedHashRate as Reported,
   CurrentHashRate as [Current]
FROM 
   vwMinerSummary
WHERE 
   $__timeFilter(time) 
   and Miner = 'Miner1'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
   time, 
   Miner , 
   HashRate as [Real], 
   ReportedHashRate as Reported,
   CurrentHashRate as [Current]
FROM 
   vwMinerSummary
WHERE 
   $__timeFilter(time) 
   and Miner = 'Miner2'
ORDER BY 1

select max(time) time, sum(isnull(SwitchPower, TotalPower)) Power from MinerSummary 
where  $__timeFilter(time) 
group by runid

select  sum(case when SuccessFlag = 1 then 1 else 0 end) [Successful Restarts], sum(case when SuccessFlag = 0 then 1 else 0 end) [Failed Restarts]  from MinerRestarts WHERE 
   $__timeFilter(time) 
   and Miner = 'Miner1'

select  sum(case when SuccessFlag = 1 then 1 else 0 end) [Successful Restarts], sum(case when SuccessFlag = 0 then 1 else 0 end) [Failed Restarts]  from MinerRestarts WHERE 
   $__timeFilter(time) 
   and Miner = 'Miner2'
